This was ooohh sooo gooood. Amazing art style with fantastic detail to the characters. Shading is really well done as well. Story is like any other black mail NTR sort of deal (no suprise there). I love when they make the 2D girl have veru nice shading to make her body look more fleshy and very soft to the touch. Sex scenes were amazing very very good. Also, great translation from the translators, thanks guys. 10/10 very good shiz right here mhm. ------------ I saw the animated for this doujin and it was likethe other commenters said it was a bit disappointing. In my opinion, some parts of it were well done like the jiggle physics and the some movements. They mix good animation with still image stuff, which is really weird in some moments. Otherwise very similar to the doujin just poor quality here and there. Good voice acting. 7/10 not bad but needs improvements. ------ Tf @NYAZ  you still favorited all of them in the series. Kind of eating your own words there bud.
